title: Bug 109718 - Display Issue with Tips in Text Items
description: When putting large content in a text item, the tips show the content in one line, which is not the expected behavior. The expected result is that the tips should display the content in the given format.
OB: When putting large content in a text item, the tips show the content in one line.
EB: The expected result is that the tips should display the content in the given format.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert a text in the layout.
2. Input the following content:
'Contents
1. MINOR ENHANCEMENTS
32.1 PROVIDE PROPERTY GROUP INFORMATION ON ELEMENT DEFN CLASS
32.2 COMPLETE THE TODO TASKS
32.3 REVIEW RESULT
32.4 MESSAGE FILE ENHANCEMENT
4. CURRENTLY, WE STORE THE ERROR MESSAGE FOR EXCEPTIONS IN THE MESSAGE.PROPERTY FILE.
NEW FEATURES
53.1 RHINO EXPRESSION PARSER
53.2 STRUCTURE TYPE SUPPORT
63.3 NEW SYSTEM
64. QA TEST SUPPORTING
7.'
